publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-06 09:13:54 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.abstract: This collection contains the records of the Committee on Student Life.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection contains some restricted material. Restrictions related to specific material are listed in the detailed contents list.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the Committee on Student Life, 2008-2016.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in one series: Committee on Student Life.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Older records were found in the Ballou Hall Basement Vault. They appear to have come from the Office of Judicial Affairs, and were managed by Veronica Carter.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Committee on Student Life Records, 1968-2016. Tufts University. Digital Collections and Archives. Medford, MA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection is processed. Processing of 2017 accessions was completed by Leah Edelman in 2017. Digital objects were stabilized and ingested. A file-level inventory was created, and series-level description as well as the finding aid was updated at the time of processing.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains reports, minutes, newspaper clippings, forms, and other documentation of the Committee on Student Life.

controlaccess.subject: Student life
Curriculum and Instruction -- Faculty
Student Activities -- Student Government, Clubs, and Organizations
Student activism

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains minutes, reports, and other documentation of the Committee on Student Life.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged in order of accession.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series contains some restricted material. Restrictions related to specific material are listed in the detailed contents list.
